channel.title: Confused
channel.description:
I just wanted some clarification on how the ranks go on these forums. like how do you get community member or vet. and how do you get the cups?
jw, if you dont like this post, just lock or w/e. i just wanted clarification cuz i get confused sometimes and idk.

item.title: Confused
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

jeez frank_you must be a very rich man. cuz thats the most riches ive seen on MITB!

Read full topic

item.title: Confused
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

basically you must earn the position and a admin will reward you if he thinks you fit the spot…

Read full topic

item.title: Confused
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:8, topic:145244”][quote author=robocz033 link=topic=198958.msg1772380#msg1772380 date=1190456182]
ok. ill work on being as helpful as pos. and ill do my best.
[/quote]Just to let you know, rep on mitb is like water on desert.[/quote]then i must be a very rich man

if you deserve rep, you will get it, do not fret about it

Read full topic

item.title: Confused
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

The Un-Named:

You get vet when you have 50 rep, and from there, other vets can “vote” you in depending on how you contribute.

did i get a vote? no one said anything, and i did make some comments on the irc.

Read full topic

item.title: Confused
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

yea. ive seen that some of them are complete dicks. but i will not say who. but some are pretty nice from what ive seen.

Read full topic

item.title: Confused
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“robocz033, post:12, topic:145244”][quote author=error.login link=topic=198958.msg1772744#msg1772744 date=1190474579]
stop being so generous lol, i hated the rep reset because i had about well alot of rep
[/quote]

i like being generous! and helping people. its just something i enjoy doing.=)

Just to let you know, rep on mitb is like water on desert.

i am aware of that, like nobody here has much rep…oh well…ill be the one to earn it. hopefully.[/quote]

that’ll be hard… the people on here with 15 rep and higher are hard to impress

Read full topic

You get vet when you have 50 rep, and from there, other vets can “vote” you in depending on how you contribute.

item.title: Confused
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:4, topic:145244”]If you get a minimum of 50 rep points robocz033, you can send a member of the staff a private message. They will check your rep logs, clarifying that they are not “fake” reps, and are given for good reasons. For moparscape vet. I believe it is 100 rep.

Too get cups, you need to show that you basically are very good at it and stand out.[/quote]
Has to be an admin tbh.

Read full topic

item.title: Confused
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

ok, well im pretty darn good at helping people, seeing that thats pretty much my favorite thing to do in life = ), no lie. and im gonna be more active on here because im getting sick of private servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Confused
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

If you get a minimum of 50 rep points robocz033, you can send a member of the staff a private message. They will check your rep logs, clarifying that they are not “fake” reps, and are given for good reasons. For moparscape vet. I believe it is 100 rep.

Too get cups, you need to show that you basically are very good at it and stand out.

Read full topic

item.title: Confused
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

cups are awarded by mopar an admins, community member an vet are awarded when you get 50 rep i think, and well the others are just by post count

Read full topic
